meanings.definition: A group of bracts resembling an outer calyx, located just beneath the true calyx of a flower.
meanings.sent1: The epicalyx of the flower added extra protection.
meanings.sent2: The epicalyx looked like a beautiful crown around the flower.
meanings.sent3: The epicalyx decided to throw a party for the calyx.
meanings.sent4: The epicalyx stood guard like a loyal knight around the flower.
meanings.sent5: The epicalyx shimmered in the sunlight, enhancing the flower's beauty.

meanings.definition: A whorl of bracts situated just beneath the calyx of a flower.
meanings.sent1: She carefully examined the epicalyx of the delicate flower.
meanings.sent2: The epicalyx provided additional support to the flower.
meanings.sent3: The epicalyx whispered secrets to the calyx above.
meanings.sent4: The epicalyx embraced the flower like a protective shield.
meanings.sent5: The intricate epicalyx added a touch of elegance to the bloom.
